title: Breonna Taylor Case: Judge dismisses major charges against officers, accuses boyfriend for death
content: A federal judge dismissed felony charges against two former Louisville officers involved in falsifying a warrant that led to Breonna Taylor's death. The judge ruled that Taylor's boyfriend, Kenneth Walker, who fired at police during the raid, was the legal cause of her death. Some charges against the officers remain, and the case is undergoing further review.
summary: A federal judge dismissed felony charges against two former Louisville officers involved in falsifying a warrant that led to Breonna Taylor's death. The judge ruled that Taylor's boyfriend, Kenneth Walker, who fired at police during the raid, was the legal cause of her death. Some charges against the officers remain, and the case is undergoing further review.

title: Russian special forces end hostage crisis in Volgograd Prison, 4 ISIS-aligned inmates neutralised
content: A standoff at the IK-19 Surovikino penal colony in Russia's Volgograd region ended with Russian special forces killing four ISIS-aligned inmates who had taken hostages. The prisoners, armed with knives, injured several guards and seized control of part of the prison. The incident resulted in four prison employees' deaths and several injuries among guards and prisoners.
summary: A standoff at the IK-19 Surovikino penal colony in Russia's Volgograd region ended with Russian special forces killing four ISIS-aligned inmates who had taken hostages. The prisoners, armed with knives, injured several guards and seized control of part of the prison. The incident resulted in four prison employees' deaths and several injuries among guards and prisoners.

title: RFK Jr joins Trump at Arizona rally as 'special guest', cites shared concerns on health and freedom
content: Robert F Kennedy Jr endorsed Donald Trump at a rally in Glendale, Arizona, marking a notable shift as they previously criticized each other. Kennedy, who earlier suspended his presidential campaign, announced his exit from the ballot in several battleground states, urging votes for Trump in those areas. He discussed common concerns like health and safety with Trump.
summary: Robert F Kennedy Jr endorsed Donald Trump at a rally in Glendale, Arizona, marking a notable shift as they previously criticized each other. Kennedy, who earlier suspended his presidential campaign, announced his exit from the ballot in several battleground states, urging votes for Trump in those areas. He discussed common concerns like health and safety with Trump.

title: 'A never Trump guy': A Vance remix goes viral
Beep... beep: Trump rants on Fox, punches phone buttons
Taliban ban women's voices & faces sans veils in public
content: The Taliban in Afghanistan issued new laws approved by supreme leader Hibatullah Akhundzada, enforcing restrictions on women's public presence. Women must veil fully in public, avoid any bare faces, and their voices should not be heard publicly. The laws, published on Wednesday, also ban music and non-related men and women mixing in public settings.
summary: The Taliban in Afghanistan issued new laws approved by supreme leader Hibatullah Akhundzada, enforcing restrictions on women's public presence. Women must veil fully in public, avoid any bare faces, and their voices should not be heard publicly. The laws, published on Wednesday, also ban music and non-related men and women mixing in public settings.

title: Rohingyas in dire condition in Bangladesh camps, says HRW
‘War will end with Ukraine remaining a ...’: Biden affirms support to Ukraine, approves new military package
content: President Joe Biden announced a $125 million military aid package for Ukraine, reaffirming US support amid its ongoing conflict with Russia. He discussed the significance of this support with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The package includes air-defense missiles and other critical weapons. The US also imposed sanctions on over 400 Russian entities and individuals aiding the war effort.
summary: President Joe Biden announced a $125 million military aid package for Ukraine, reaffirming US support amid its ongoing conflict with Russia. He discussed the significance of this support with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The package includes air-defense missiles and other critical weapons. The US also imposed sanctions on over 400 Russian entities and individuals aiding the war effort.

title: ‘Want to thank Bobby’: Trump expresses gratitude to ‘great guy’ RFK Jr for his endorsement
content: Former President Donald Trump thanked Robert F Kennedy Jr for endorsing him during a restaurant visit in Las Vegas. Kennedy, who had run as a third-party presidential candidate, announced the suspension of his campaign and criticised the Democratic Party for their actions against him and Trump. He cited diminishing poll numbers and financial issues as reasons for his withdrawal.
summary: Former President Donald Trump thanked Robert F Kennedy Jr for endorsing him during a restaurant visit in Las Vegas. Kennedy, who had run as a third-party presidential candidate, announced the suspension of his campaign and criticised the Democratic Party for their actions against him and Trump. He cited diminishing poll numbers and financial issues as reasons for his withdrawal.

title: Several dead, many injured after knife attack at a festival in Germany
content: A knife attack during a festival in Solingen, Germany, on Friday evening left three dead and at least five seriously injured. The unidentified attacker fled the scene quickly and remains at large. The incident casts a shadow over Solingen's 650th anniversary celebrations, leading to the festival's cancellation and leaving the community in shock and grief.
summary: A knife attack during a festival in Solingen, Germany, on Friday evening left three dead and at least five seriously injured. The unidentified attacker fled the scene quickly and remains at large. The incident casts a shadow over Solingen's 650th anniversary celebrations, leading to the festival's cancellation and leaving the community in shock and grief.

title: Iranian hackers group targeted WhatsApp accounts of Biden, Trump officials: Meta
content: Meta reported detecting a hacking campaign targeting WhatsApp accounts of US officials from both the Biden and Trump administrations. The attacks, attributed to Iranian hacker group APT42, involved masquerading as technical support for online services like Google and AOL. Meta blocked the attempts and found no evidence of successful breaches.
summary: Meta reported detecting a hacking campaign targeting WhatsApp accounts of US officials from both the Biden and Trump administrations. The attacks, attributed to Iranian hacker group APT42, involved masquerading as technical support for online services like Google and AOL. Meta blocked the attempts and found no evidence of successful breaches.

title: Biden talks with Zelenskyy, announces new military aid for Kyiv
Historic 'League of their own' ballpark burns down in California
content: A fire engulfed the historic wooden grandstands at Jay Littleton Ball Park in Ontario, Southern California. Built in 1937, the grandstands were a notable filming location, featured in movies like 'A League of Their Own.' While no injuries were reported, the cause is still under investigation, with aged dry wood possibly intensifying the blaze.
summary: A fire engulfed the historic wooden grandstands at Jay Littleton Ball Park in Ontario, Southern California. Built in 1937, the grandstands were a notable filming location, featured in movies like 'A League of Their Own.' While no injuries were reported, the cause is still under investigation, with aged dry wood possibly intensifying the blaze.

title: Kerry Kennedy calls RFK Jr's endorsement of Trump a 'betrayal' of family values
content: Kerry Kennedy expressed disappointment as her brother, RFK Jr, withdrew from the presidential race to endorse Donald Trump. She endorsed Kamala Harris and Tim Walz, noting a breach of family values in her brother’s decision. RFK Jr cited no viable path to victory as the reason for his withdrawal.
summary: Kerry Kennedy expressed disappointment as her brother, RFK Jr, withdrew from the presidential race to endorse Donald Trump. She endorsed Kamala Harris and Tim Walz, noting a breach of family values in her brother’s decision. RFK Jr cited no viable path to victory as the reason for his withdrawal.

title: Arizona man Ronald Lee Syvrud arrested for issuing death threats against Donald Trump
content: Ronald Lee Syvrud was arrested by Arizona authorities after posting death threats against former President Donald Trump, who was attending a campaign event in the state. The 66-year-old was apprehended without resistance in Cochise County. This incident followed a recent assassination attempt on Trump during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania.
summary: Ronald Lee Syvrud was arrested by Arizona authorities after posting death threats against former President Donald Trump, who was attending a campaign event in the state. The 66-year-old was apprehended without resistance in Cochise County. This incident followed a recent assassination attempt on Trump during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania.

title: 'Broken seats, overhead bin held together with duct tape': Passenger recounts harrowing experience on PIA flight
content: A PIA passenger recounted his treacherous flight to Skardu, describing the journey as fraught with unexpected challenges due to the airline's troubled state. He faced issues such as a broken seat handle and overhead bin held together with duct tape, all while flying through dangerous mountain ranges. Despite his concerns, he was captivated by Skardu's stunning scenery.
summary: A PIA passenger recounted his treacherous flight to Skardu, describing the journey as fraught with unexpected challenges due to the airline's troubled state. He faced issues such as a broken seat handle and overhead bin held together with duct tape, all while flying through dangerous mountain ranges. Despite his concerns, he was captivated by Skardu's stunning scenery.

title: Harry and Meghan’s pact: Why children Archie and Lilibet won’t star in upcoming Netflix shows
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle had differing views on their children's public exposure, with Meghan initially agreeing to feature them in a Netflix show. However, Harry's preference to shield their children has prevailed, and Archie and Lilibet will be out of the limelight. Meghan also chose a different filming location for her cooking show to protect her family's privacy.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle had differing views on their children's public exposure, with Meghan initially agreeing to feature them in a Netflix show. However, Harry's preference to shield their children has prevailed, and Archie and Lilibet will be out of the limelight. Meghan also chose a different filming location for her cooking show to protect her family's privacy.

title: Trump assassination attempt: Multiple Secret service agents placed on leave amid ongoing probe
content: Following an assassination attempt on Donald Trump, the Secret Service put at least five agents on leave, including the head of the Pittsburgh field office. The shooter, Thomas Matthew Crooks, managed to fire multiple shots, causing casualties and injuring Trump. The incident led to the resignation of Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle soon after.
summary: Following an assassination attempt on Donald Trump, the Secret Service put at least five agents on leave, including the head of the Pittsburgh field office. The shooter, Thomas Matthew Crooks, managed to fire multiple shots, causing casualties and injuring Trump. The incident led to the resignation of Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle soon after.

title: 'Like Steak or Spaghetti': Trump's old interview on homosexuality goes viral
content: An old interview with Donald Trump from Late Night with Conan O'Brien has resurfaced online. In the 2004 interview, Trump asked a contestant about his sexuality and later compared choosing a partner to selecting a meal from a menu. The comment has sparked debates on social media, especially given Trump's complex stance on LGBTQ rights.
summary: An old interview with Donald Trump from Late Night with Conan O'Brien has resurfaced online. In the 2004 interview, Trump asked a contestant about his sexuality and later compared choosing a partner to selecting a meal from a menu. The comment has sparked debates on social media, especially given Trump's complex stance on LGBTQ rights.

title: 'What real love looks like': Michelle Obama lauds Gus Walz’s emotional DNC reaction, slams online bullies
content: Michelle Obama praised Gus Walz, son of vice president candidate Tim Walz, for his heartfelt reaction at the Democratic National Convention. Obama denounced the bullying Gus faced after Ann Coulter called him 'weird.' Gus, diagnosed with nonverbal learning disorder and anxiety, stood out for his emotional pride when his dad took the stage.
summary: Michelle Obama praised Gus Walz, son of vice president candidate Tim Walz, for his heartfelt reaction at the Democratic National Convention. Obama denounced the bullying Gus faced after Ann Coulter called him 'weird.' Gus, diagnosed with nonverbal learning disorder and anxiety, stood out for his emotional pride when his dad took the stage.
